description: Demolition of 345 Southwark Park Road and all site preparation works, for a residential-led mixed use development comprising 22 new affordable social rent homes and 24 new private homes (containing a mix of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments), associated cycle and wheelchair car parking, 340 sqm  flexible ground floor office and community use floorspace (B1/D1); associated hard and soft landscaping and public realm works.
decision_conditions: Roof to be used only in emergency
